text.title: River Suite
text.subtitle: Hear the sounds of the river at night

features.name: Two Double Beds with Mosquito Netting
features.description: Enjoy two spacious double beds (140 cm x 200 cm) equipped with mosquito netting for a peaceful sleep.

features.name: Outdoor Extra Large Bathtub
features.description: Relax in an outdoor extra large bathtub surrounded by a river and jungle atmosphere.

features.name: Climate-Controlled Bathroom
features.description: A modern bathroom with climate control and a separate shower for a refreshing experience.

features.name: Wood & LED Light Mandala
features.description: A striking wood and LED light mandala that enhances the ambiance.

features.name: Built-in Wardrobes
features.description: Two built-in wardrobes provide ample storage space.

features.name: Air Conditioning & Dehumidifier
features.description: Experience optimal comfort with efficient air conditioning and a dehumidifier.

features.name: Smart Entertainment & Security
features.description: Features a portable waterproof Sonos speaker, charging station with cords, and a security box.

features.name: Black-Out Curtains
features.description: High-quality black-out curtains ensure complete privacy and darkness.
